algorithm_technique: Count frequencies of each number using a hash map (Counter) and apply combination formula.
problem_summary_simple: Count pairs of identical numbers in an array where the first index is smaller than the second.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a hash map to store frequencies of numbers, then calculates combinations (n choose 2) for each frequency.
key_insights: The problem boils down to finding pairs of identical elements.
If a number appears 'c' times, it can form c*(c-1)/2 pairs.
A hash map (collections.Counter) efficiently stores the frequencies of each number.
